column1: #text=There is a book I wanted to read .
#text=However , I was n't sure if it was a book I actually wanted to buy .
#text=Instead , I decided to go to the public library to see if I could borrow it .
#text=Once I got to the library , I decided to use the card catalog to see if the particular book I wanted was carried by the library .
#text=I used the paper and pen provided to write down the aisle and shelf number where the book would be located .
#text=Walking down the aisles of shelves , I found the one where my book should have been .
#text=I then went to the front desk and asked the librarian if the book was out .
#text=She told me it had just come back in , and if I could wait a bit for it to be processed , I could then borrow it .
#text=Once she checked it in , she let me have it and I then checked it out .
#text=I had to show her my library card , and she told me my due date to return the book was in two weeks .
